headline.main: SHOCKING BUTCHERY.; THE MURDERER BLOWS OUT HIS OWN BRAINS. CORONER'S INQUEST COMPLETE. The Father, Two Brothers and One Servant-girl Mortally Wounded--The Mother and Another Servant-girl Seriously Injured. A Son Attempts to Murder all his Father's Family.

docs.lead_paragraph: At a late hour on Tuesday night a more horrible tragedy was enacted in this City than we have ever before had occasion to record. Francis A. Gouldy, aged 19 years, attempted, at his father's house, No. 217 West Thirtieth-street, between Eighth and Ninth avenues, to murder his father, mother, two brothers and two servant girls, and terminated the terrific scene by effectually blowing out his own brains.

docs.lead_paragraph: The following letter was written by Mr. WILLIAMSON in reply to the Committee who informed him of his nomination for Congress. It is a clear and explicit statement of his opinions, and leaves no doubt as to the political course which he will pursue if elected:

docs.snippet: THE QUARANTINE TROUBLES.--APPLICATION FOR AN INJUNCTION AGAINST REBUILDING THE HOSPITALS.--The Castleton Board of Health has applied to the Supreme Court of Richmond County for an injunction to restrain the Commissioners of Emigration from rebuilding...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE QUARANTINE TROUBLES.--APPLICATION FOR AN INJUNCTION AGAINST REBUILDING THE HOSPITALS.--The Castleton Board of Health has applied to the Supreme Court of Richmond County for an injunction to restrain the Commissioners of Emigration from rebuilding the hospitals and other Quarantine buildings on Staten Island.

headline.main: EUROPE.; Interesting from India and China. MASSACRE OF CHRISTIANS IN MOROCCO. Cotton and Breadstuffs steady--Consols 98 3-8 a 98 1-2. Probable Settlement of the FrancePortuguese Difficulty. AMERICAN RACERS IN ENGLAND. ADVICES FOUR DAYS LATER ARRIVAL OF THE PERSIA AND THE VIGO

docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal Mail steamship Persia. C. H. E. JUNKING, Esq., Commander, from Liverpool on the afternoon of Oct. 16, arrived at this port early yesterday morning. She brought 221 passengers. The Royal Mail screw-steamsain Vigo. P. McGUIGAN, Esq., Commander, from Liverpool Oct. 13 with 250 passengers, arrived two hours later.

docs.snippet: THE INDICATED CITY OFFICIALS.--Who are the illustrious defalcators indicated by the late Grand jury of the Court of General Sessions. As we remarked yesterday, although only seven were indicted, there were three or four times seven quaking in their...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE INDICATED CITY OFFICIALS.--Who are the illustrious defalcators indicated by the late Grand jury of the Court of General Sessions. As we remarked yesterday, although only seven were indicted, there were three or four times seven quaking in their boots, anticipating that their turn is come at last. Then who are the seven, that the other may be relieved of their apprehension for another term of so?

docs.snippet: The Vigo, which left Liverpool on the 13th inst., and the Persia, which left the same port on the 16th, are now about due. The former brings four days', and the latter a week's later European advices. Two lake steamers--the America and the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Vigo, which left Liverpool on the 13th inst., and the Persia, which left the same port on the 16th, are now about due. The former brings four days', and the latter a week's later European advices. Two lake steamers--the America and the Ontario--owned by HUGH TYLER, were chartered yesterday for the Paraguay Expedition, at $4,000 per month.

docs.snippet: From Mexico we have at last what is probably an authentic account of the engagement between VIDAURRI and MIRAMON. The former was not on the field when the engagement commenced, and his army appears to have been attacked when least prepared for it.
docs.lead_paragraph: From Mexico we have at last what is probably an authentic account of the engagement between VIDAURRI and MIRAMON. The former was not on the field when the engagement commenced, and his army appears to have been attacked when least prepared for it.

headline.main: WEST INDIES.; Demerarn--Business Promise--Return Passages--The Labor Movement--St. Kitte--Turk's Island.

docs.lead_paragraph: By the arrival of the bark Virginia, Capt. HILL we have dates from Democratic to the 29th September from Berbice to the 23d. from St. Kitts and St. Eustasius to Oct. 2, and from Turk's Island to the 9th inst. At Demerara the sugar crop was nearly all gathered in, and was one of the most abundant in British Guiana for twenty years past that is,

docs.snippet: DEATH OF MR. C. F. DANIELS.-- Mr. C. F. DANIELS, recently editor of the New-London Chronicle, died at New-London, Conn., on the 20th instant, aged 69. Mr. DANIELS was a native of Waterford, Conn., was educated for the law, but forsook the profession...
docs.lead_paragraph: DEATH OF MR. C. F. DANIELS.-- Mr. C. F. DANIELS, recently editor of the New-London Chronicle, died at New-London, Conn., on the 20th instant, aged 69. Mr. DANIELS was a native of Waterford, Conn., was educated for the law, but forsook the profession and assumed editorial labor in Cheraw, S. C., in 1825.

docs.snippet: The provisions in unusually depressed, owing to heavy importation and a very reduced consumption, arising from the great abundance and cheapness of sweet potatoes.
docs.lead_paragraph: The provisions in unusually depressed, owing to heavy importation and a very reduced consumption, arising from the great abundance and cheapness of sweet potatoes.
